headline: Gov. DeWine orders flags lowered for firefighter killed in Wayne County crash
author: Jen Steer
sentences: Town and Country Fire District Lt. Philip Wigal was responding to a minor crash near state Route 301 in Wayne County when a commercial vehicle hit a fire truck and trooper’s cruisers, the Ohio State Highway Patrol said.
The flags of the United States and the state of Ohio will be flown at half-staff at the Ohio Statehouse and all public buildings in Wayne County until his funeral.
Mike DeWine ordered flags lowered in honor of the firefighter killed in a crash on Interstate 71 on Monday.
Wigal started with the Town and Country Fire District in August 2006 as a part-time firefighter.
**Editor’s note: The correct spelling of the firefighter’s last name is Wigal.
